name: Cheu ba chang
bio_data: Cheu ba chang is an accomplished chef with a passion for culinary arts. With over a decade of experience, he has honed his skills in various international cuisines. Known for his creativity and attention to detail, John has delighted countless patrons with his exquisite dishes. From his humble beginnings in a small kitchen to working in renowned restaurants, he has gained a reputation for his innovative flavors and visually stunning presentations. John's dedication to his craft and commitment to delivering exceptional dining experiences make him a sought-after chef in the culinary world.

recipes.description: Spicy and savory chicken stir-fry dish with peanuts and vegetables.
recipes.cooking_method: To cook this item, preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Season the item with salt, pepper, and your favorite herbs. Place it on a baking sheet and roast for 30-40 minutes, or until it reaches the desired internal temperature. Let it rest for a few minutes before serving. Enjoy!
